title: THE ISLE OF REMORAY! - Anno 1800 160+ Modded Campaign in 2025 (Episode 35)

tasks.task: Farming and Infrastructure Development on Sapin's Remoray Island
subtasks: Build and manage oil refinery, including turning it off and connecting oil trains.
Construct main roads and ensure proper alignment for train tracks.
Establish fisheries and additional depots mapping out specific locations on both sides of the island.
Set up harbor area, including fisheries, marketplaces, and administrative buildings, with consideration for historical ties to La Corona.
Create housing for farmers and workers, ensuring population goals are met, and apply brick housing and aesthetic upgrades.
Implement utilities and services such as clean water pumps, schools, and marketplaces.
Develop farm fields, including vegetable, grain, and potato crops, utilizing tractors and fuel depots.
Establish trade and logistics, managing resource distribution and export routes for bread and flour mills.
Enhance island aesthetics through landscaping, beautification, and placement of strategic monuments like statues of Lady Morning Star.
Expand infrastructure to small villages and additional strategic points, ensuring efficient resource management and worker allocation.

tasks.task: Farming and Infrastructure Development on Sapin's Remoray Island
